alert.note: Alert for Chester; Union; York (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 5:37PM EDT until August 07 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: The National Weather Service in Greenville-Spartanburg has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Chester County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern York County in Upstate South Carolina... Southeastern Union County in Upstate South Carolina... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 537 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 10 miles west of York to 11 miles east of Union to 16 miles east of Laurens, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Rock Hill, Chester, Newport, Lesslie, Great Falls, Fort Lawn, Carlisle, Richburg, Chester State Park and Catawba. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report damaging winds, hail, or flooding to the National Weather Service by calling toll free, 1, 800, 2 6 7, 8 1 0 1, or by posting on our Facebook page, or Tweet it using hashtag nwsgsp. Your message should describe the event and the specific location where it occurred.
